full_summary:
**Tender Announcement**

**Reference:** W0121-24JP18
**Title:** Vehicle Rental in San Angelo, Texas
**Date:** December 8, 2023

**Government of Canada | Ministère des Travaux publics et des Services gouvernementaux** (PSPC)

**Request for Proposals (RFP)**

The Canadian Armed Forces (CAF) requires a vehicle rental service in San Angelo, Texas, from January 31 to February 26, 2024. The delivery and drop-off of vehicles will take place at the San Angelo Regional Airport.

**Services Required:**

* Vehicle leasing for sedans, coupes, station wagons
* Vehicle leasing for light trucks and sport utility vehicles
* Vehicle leasing for passenger vans or minivans

**Procurement Method:**

Competitive - Selective tendering

**Evaluation Criteria:**

 Lowest Price

**Submission Deadline:**

December 20, 2023, at 14:00 EST. Any submissions received after this time will be considered non-responsive.

**Contact Information:**

Hunter, Martine (SPAC/PSPC)
martine.hunter@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

**Advertisement URL:**

https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18193979?extsite=MTgxOTM5NzlfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==
